__e: Doesn't like going home when Esther's away.
Look, I do know that we talked about a lot of things last night, and Esther wasn't one of them.
Why say Esther isn't the woman who saw him?
Esther and I will give you and your baby all the love we have left to give.
- My mother's name was Esther and since you have been kinder than my mother was, I have given you a better name.
